project.name: opencode-supermemory
project.description: OpenCode plugin that gives coding agents persistent memory using Supermemory. Your agent remembers what you tell it - across sessions, across projects. Features automatic context injection, intelligent compaction, and privacy protection.

features.title: Why opencode-supermemory?
features.subtitle: Teach your Agent once, remember forever. No more repeating the same rules every session.

list.title: Cross-Project Memory
list.desc: User coding preferences automatically apply across different projects. Teach once, remember forever.

list.title: Automatic Context Injection
list.desc: Seamlessly loads user profiles and project memories at session start. Agent knows your habits from the first message.

list.title: Intelligent Compaction
list.desc: Automatically summarizes and saves context when token usage exceeds 80%, preventing loss of critical information.

list.title: Natural Language Triggers
list.desc: Say 'remember this' or 'save this' and the agent auto-saves to memory. No complex operations required.

list.title: Privacy Protection
list.desc: Content in <private> tags is automatically redacted before upload. Sensitive data never leaves your machine.

list.title: Codebase Indexing
list.desc: Run /supermemory-init to explore and memorize your codebase structure, patterns, and conventions.
